a.title: Truc Huynh and Lauren Reid Kane

img.alt: Truc Huynh and Lauren Reid Kane

li.span: Reiche School New Meal Site as of April 27
To increase access to the Portland Public Schools’ meals program during the COVID-19 crisis, the district is adding Reiche Community School as 10th meal distribution site, starting Monday, April 27.
/UserFiles/Servers/Server_1094153/Image/News Images/April School Meals for Vacation Week Photo.jpg
The Portland Public Schools is maintaining its traditional April break so that everyone can have a respite after the initial push to switch to remote learning during the COVID-19 crisis. However, stu
Superintendent’s April 14 letter to families outlines plans for rest of school year for grading, instruction, calendar adjustments & more.
Superintendent’s April 8 letter to families extends remote learning until the end of the 2019-2020 school year, based on a recommendation by Maine DOE.
